title: Navigate forwards to a spin button in reading mode
task: navigate forwards to spin button
setupScriptDescription: sets the date picker to March 19, 2021, hides the previous/next arrow buttons and sets focus on a link before the 'Day' spin button
refs: group spinbutton aria-labelledby aria-label aria-valuenow aria-valuetext
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Day' spin button.
assertion2: Name of the group is conveyed as: 'Choose a Date current value is Friday, March nineteenth, 2021'
